title: Six
overview: Six is a Bengali and Hindi web series streaming on Bengali OTT platform hoichoi. The series is about Soumyojit Ray who's life turns upside down, when his wife suddenly dies and he gets accused. This hoichoi original series starring Nishan Nanaiah, Darshana, and famous Bengali singer and lyricist Silajit Majumder in the lead roles. The series started streaming from 20th January 2018.
